summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to appraise, negotiate for and acquire real property and property rights for the Sewer Outreach - Phase IV project; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services; authorizing the awarding of contracts; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1988 budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making appropriations from the Engineering Operating Fund Municipal Sewerage 1971 Fund and Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
